summary: A woman named Lalita Kai Kumar was chained to a tree in the Indian jungle for 40 days after a domestic dispute. She was rescued by a local shepherd who heard her cries for help. Lalita has extreme psychosis and was tied up by her husband, who threatened to kill her if she drank water or ate food. She was taken to the hospital and has since written a letter detailing her ordeal, stating she is a crime victim but will survive.
keywords: woman, chained, tree, domestic dispute, shocking letter, psychosis, crime victim, India, jungle, hospital, rescue, letter, survival
